Interface Entity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GameObject, IDInterface
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Consumable, Item
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConsumable, AbstractItem, AbstractLivingEntity, AbstractLockable, Activatable, Book, Button, Chest, Door, Floor, Key, Library, Monster, NPC, Pane, Player, PressurePlate, Switch

extends GameObject
